**50% Recurring VPS Discount | Utah USA, Frankfurt DE & Nuremberg DE Location | KVM/OpenVZ Self Managed**

HTTP Zoom - Enterprise Hardware, Skilled Staff, Budget Prices. We have been in the business for over 3 years providing VPSs on a budget.

**All our servers are hosted on SolusVM with integrated self service in our client area.**
